missions.title: Academic Breach
missions.location: UWE (University of the West of England)
missions.briefing: Strange network activity has been detected within UWE's cybersecurity department. Suspicion of insider compromise.
objectives: Analyse packet captures from training VM network.
Identify rootkit signatures in virtual machines.
Trace communication to foreign IP domains.
missions.success_criteria: Rootkit signature found, decrypted logs analyzed, source IP traced.
missions.failure_criteria: Failure to detect malware or incomplete analysis.

missions.title: Code of Deceit
missions.briefing: A malware sample has been found hidden in a popular student repo. It mimics past CyberFirst code challenges.
missions.success_criteria: Metadata reveals author signature and links to AIDO.
missions.failure_criteria: Malware not fully reversed or metadata inconclusive.

missions.title: University VPN Breach
missions.briefing: Spoofed UWE emails have triggered credential theft at multiple universities. Suspected lateral movement.
objectives: Set up honeypots across three university VPNs.
missions.failure_criteria: At least one university system fully compromised.

missions.title: The Faculty Firewall
missions.briefing: Evidence implicates UWE in the breach. Political pressure mounts. Time for a difficult decision.
objectives: Present the forensics case to NCSC.
Choose whether to expose or suppress details.
missions.failure_criteria: Loss of ally trust or intelligence blackout.

missions.title: Siege of CyberCity
missions.briefing: AIDO launches his final cyber siege on Europe's smart city. Multiple infrastructure nodes are under threat.
objectives: Simultaneously defend Power Grid, Hospital and Airport nodes.
Use Nyota AI (YOUSS) for predictive threat defense.
Locate AIDO's real control server and disable it.
missions.success_criteria: All three sectors survive and AIDO is neutralized.
missions.failure_criteria: Any two sectors fall or AIDO escapes undetected.
